definition: better to just get the pain over with, rather than prolong the agony
pinyin: chang2 tong4 bu4 ru2 duan3 tong4

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
lit. to stand with each foot in a different boat (idiom)/fig. to have it both ways/to run after two hares/(especially) to have two lovers at the same time
to not take to heart/to be free of worried thoughts/to adopt a lighthearted perspective/lighthearted
spilt water is difficult to retrieve (idiom)/it's no use crying over spilt milk/what's done is done and can't be reversed/the damage is done/once divorced, there's no reuniting
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
to let emotions affect one's decisions
lit. win an inch, want a foot (idiom); fig. not satisfied with small gains/give him an inch, and he'll want a mile
to know the score (idiom)/to be well aware of the situation
change of affection, shift of love (idiom); to change one's feelings to another love/to fall in love with sb else
lit. chickens flying and dogs jumping (idiom)/fig. in chaos/in disarray
